Lisa Faulkner's second wedding gown has been unveiled in a romantic snap from her special day.

The Holby City actress wed TV chef John Torode at the glamorous setting of Aynhoe Park in Banbury, Oxfordshire on Thursday.

In the new image, the newlyweds look every inch the smitten pair as they share a tender moment.

In the post uploaded onto Instagram by Lisa's sister Victoria, the blushing bride, 47, wows in a simple and elegant white satin dress that featured spaghetti straps.

Lisa's second dress flashed more flesh than the ensemble she wore for the ceremony.

(Image: Instagram)

It appears that she removed the lace bodice overlay for the evening bash to transform the look.

She could be seen in the sweet picture holding her husband's face in her hands as she gazed lovingly at him.

John, 54, put on a dashing display in a navy blue three-piece suit as he held his wife around her waist and looked at her with affection.

The MasterChef judge and actress held a stunning wedding decked out with lavish decorations and extravagant features.

The couple celebrated with their close friends and family at the wedding, where Lisa's 13-year-old daughter Billie was her best woman.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

During the big day, wedding guests offered eagle-eyed fans a teased glimpse inside the swanky wedding and intimate reception party.

It was quite the crowd in attendance including Britain's Got Talent judge Amanda Holden .

Both Lisa and John took to their own social media accounts to document the big day.

Lisa wrote: "The happiest day of my life!!! Cue the wedding spam for the next few weeks!

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: aynhoepark/Instagram)

"Apologies in advance. Yesterday I married the man of my dreams @johntorodecooks and we had the BEST Day EVER, filled with all our family and friends and such Love.

"Thank you @aynhoepark we didn’t want to leave! #allyouneedislove ."

John also posted: "Officially married the girl of my dreams yesterday @lisafaulknercooks what a day!! Thank you @aynhoepark ."
description: The couple tied the knot in a romantic ceremony attended by their family and friends last week
